text: Kamil Bury (born 23 July 1995) is a Polish cross-country skier. He competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics. His brother Dominik is also a skier. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Polish male cross-country skiers Category:Tour de Ski skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Poland Category:People from Cieszyn
title: Kamil Bury
